lead_paragraph: Mr. Gaines will join Vanessa Redgrave and James Earl Jones on Broadway in “Driving Miss Daisy.”
snippet: Mr. Gaines will join Vanessa Redgrave and James Earl Jones on Broadway in “Driving Miss Daisy.”

headline.main: ‘Miss Daisy’ Gets a Son: Boyd Gaines
headline.print_headline: Broadway’s ‘Miss Daisy’ Gets a Son: Boyd Gaines

byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY; Compiled by RACHEL LEE HARRIS
